column5: What free stuff do you guys recommend for a new laptop?  Hook me up!  S.
Avasti Free + Malwarebytes. same here..avast and malwarebytes
Security Essentials from Microsoft..  It's free and it's available for download directly from microsoft.com, so you know it's legit.
Just stop watching so much porn and you should be okay !
Hahahaha....good advice!  S. bad advice...lol  Avira is what the techie put on our latest laptops

I run advanced system care ultimate. Not free but got me up and running when I had some major issues and all the above failed. I happen to have a license number I haven't used for the pro version I bought on accident thinking the ultimate had expired. PM me if you want to give it a shot.

I'm going with Highdrifter on this one.  I use the MS and Security Essentials too with no problems.  However, some ISP's give a software to use too at no cost.  Bell has what was MacAfee and now branded as Intel Security.  It's good too as my office uses it with no problems.
x3-- with Highdrifter and GBW here as well Sinker  MSE is a terrific free utility -effective and doesn't use a ton of resources to run  Enjoy the new laptop  Paul
